extendedInfo.description: Play Oasis Poker against the house. This game is similar to Caribbean Stud and is great for poker fans and those who enjoy five card stud. In this game you can replace any of your cards before calling, you can eliminate bad cards to try and improve your hand. Includes a bonus side bet option where you can win up to a $20,000 jackpot.How to play1] Place an ante bet between $1-$50 with an optional $1 bonus bet.2] You and the dealer receive 5 cards, one of the dealer cards will be face up.3] You may now optionally replace 1-5 cards. Touch the cards you do not want and then press the draw button to exchange them. Each card you exchange will cost you an amount equal to your ante. If you draw all 5 cards you must then raise.4] You must now fold or call. If you fold you will forfeit your ante and side bet. Calling costs two times the ante amount.5] After a call the dealers cards are revealed. You win if your hand is better than the dealer. Press "menu-show pay table" to see how much you will win. If you made a bonus bet and your hand is a flush or better then you will win a bonus payment, check the pay table to see how much you will receive.The dealer must have a hand containing an Ace and King or better to qualify.

reviews.title: Steve
reviews.comment: Very poor computer programming dealer goes on unbelievable long win streaks...and random.draw really.... most times one or two cards match cards on dealer hands..beyond poor programming...this not random dealing.  to lose so many hands in a row twice ive gone from 30000 to start over at 5000...worst game experience ever....this is not random drawing cards..worst poker game online dealer hands rigged.. no way you can randomly lose so many hands in a row...go work as a walmart greeter your programming sucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game is fun but the scoring doesn\'t work properly. It will say you won $150 but it only adds $50-$100. Good to pass time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Motohead in ME - Too many hangs
reviews.comment: While I did enjoy this game, it didn\'t take long for it to start hanging to the point of needing to restart the game...frustrating : ^ X .                              Motorola DROID Bionic \"Gingerbread\"
reviews.author: A Google User
